document.full_text: texas, the state that executes more inmates than any other, said on wednesday it will follow oklahoma and switch one of its lethal injection drugs to a sedative often used to euthanize animals.
document.title: for executions, texas switches to drug used on animals
lines_and_colors: texas, the state that executes more inmates than any other, said on wednesday it will follow oklahoma and switch one of its lethal injection drugs to a sedative often used to euthanize animals.
